entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: simple console logger should support singleline except for exception use case #110793
    Future
  • 在实操中采用Console.WriteLine方法输出派生类的基类引用出的基类成员时出现System.FormatException:“Input string was not in a correct format.错误，更改格式化方式后恢复正常 #110785
  • Consider improving FrozenSet for byte/char #110783
    Future
  • Tensor.StdDev does not handle non-contiguous input #110772
  • [mono][tvos] DataSet Xml serialization tests failing on tvos lanes #110771
  • JsonNumberHandling.AllowReadingFromString on class-level fails for double[][], but works in JsonSourceGenerationOptions #110770
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Matrix3x2 Regression on 12/13/2024 1:28:01 PM #110789
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 5 Regressions on 12/12/2024 1:14:47 PM #110788
  • Access Violation Exception after upgrading from .NET 8 to .NET 9 #110769
  • Test failure: JIT/Stress/ABI/stubs_do/stubs_do.cmd #110763

Closed

  • Removal of Helper Method Frames (HMF) #110767
    Future
  • Unable to build Solution that contains multi-targeted projects and using ArtifactsPath with IncludeProjectNameInArtifactsPaths set to false #110791
  • There's no way to call native library resolution on a specific AssemblyLoadContext #13472
  • [NativeAOT] `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` does not work with closed delegates over instance methods on value types #108688
    10.0.0
  • Dotnet 9 new DLL's not found #110786
  • [API Proposal]: Implement `IReadOnlyList<T>` in `LinkedList<T>` or create `IReadOnlyLinkedList<T>` and `IReadOnlyLinkedListNode<T>` #110784
  • ILC: missing warning for DAM on type when used through derived type #104740
    10.0.0
  • [browser][hybridglobalization][aot] `Assert.StartsWith` cannot find a match #102373
    10.0.0
  • Possible Task.WhenAll performance improvements #110530
  • System.ValueTuple - compatibility issue between net 4.8 and net standard 2.0 #84618
  • Delegate for Generic Interface methods #4611
  • Need script to get crossgen for current dotnet runtime on linux #11688

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Tizen linux-armel build #110792
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove workaround for fixed Roslyn bug in HttpHeaders #110790
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • JIT: revise how we track if nodes have been morphed #110787
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Use -pack switch instead of -allconfigurations to create packages #110778
    needs-area-label
  • Avoid array allocation in Task.WhenAll? #110777
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Remove `FCThrow`s from Reflection APIs. #110766
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110765
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110764
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.x
  • Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110762
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • Fix `DiagnosticMethodInfo.Create(Delegate)` for valuetype methods #110782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Use floating tag for webassembly image #109374
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Update TagName docs to include behavior if tag is not found #109934
    documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution
  • [browser] Remove WASM `HybridGlobalization` from runtime code #110567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix System.Reflection.Emit `SetChecksum` creating invalid pdb #110205
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Reflection.Emit, 9.0.2
  • [release/9.0-staging] Avoid exception when parsing AD path for port number #110224
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 9.0.2
  • [release/8.0] Remove DiagnosticSource reference from Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions #110458
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging, 8.0.13
  • exclude obj/cmake from codeql. #110630
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix templates patch in the bench #110779
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix base type marking for DAM annotated classes #110655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable bundle archive building in source build #110448
    blocked, blocking, area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Fix rebuild of browser-bench with startup apps #110776
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix native aot outerloop #110768
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ambiguous call build break in Fuzzing project #110761
    area-Meta, 10.0.0
  • Remove Helper Method Frames (HMF) from Reflection #110627
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [JIT] Enable EGPRs in JIT by adding REX2 encoding to the backend. #106557
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • Avoid a list/array allocation in Task.WhenAll(enumerable) #110536
    area-System.Threading.Tasks

Updated

  • Build the "in build" crossgen2 into a pack that we can use within the VMR #110676
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix race condition when cancelling pending HTTP connection attempts #110744
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] [Profiler] Avoid Recursive ThreadStoreLock in Profiling Thread Enumerator #110665
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND/NF feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
  • Expression.Compile: empty the evaluation stack before evaluating second expression in OrElse and AndAlso #110721
    area-System.Linq.Expressions
  • [browser] Add `OutputType=Library` tests #110731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix GetNormalizedLength on iOS and similar platforms #110723
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2603456 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement WriteStringValueSegment defined in Issue 67337 #101356
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Use managed signer for bundles #110417
    area-HostModel
  • Fix NativeAOT ThunksPool thunk data block size handling. #110732
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Additional Tar tests for filled in size when data is empty #107815
    test-enhancement, area-System.Formats.Tar
  • [JIT] Improve x86 HWIntrinsic containment #110736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Abort after handling native `SIGSEGV` crash when chaining fails on iOS-like platforms #110741
    area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Add more ZipArchive tests to confirm the Zip64 fix does not affect reading zip files generatd with the old bug #103152
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Change condition for packs set in MSBuild #110389
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update armv6 image #102899
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cDAC] Use Moq in CodeVersionsTest #110750
    test-enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Avoid IndexOutOfRangeException in ZipArchive #109168
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Add linux-riscv64 nativeaot runtime build #110688
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • Update to .NET 10 build images #110198
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Specify a security descriptor when using global Mutex #110416
    area-System.Diagnostics.PerformanceCounter, area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, 10.0.0
  • Use IRootFunctions in Tensor.StdDev #110641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update Stepping through GenericPInvokeCalli Stub under the Debugger #110677
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Speed up single-value SearchValues<string> candidate verification #108365
    area-System.Memory, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Fix nativeaot outerloop #109010
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • Remove BinaryReader and BinaryWriter references from ZipArchive #103153
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler.StartRequestAsync assertion failed #109799
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Limit OpenSSL TLS Session cache for client SSL_CTX instances #110154
    area-System.Net.Security, 10.0.0
  • Out of range exception on system without a WINS configuration #110165
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • win32: add fallback to environment vars for system folder #109673
    area-System.Runtime, os-windows-nano, community-contribution
  • Add Dispose for X509Chain instance #110740
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Bugfix InvalidOperationException/IndexOutOfRangeException in HttpListener.EndGetContext #110695
    area-System.Net, 9.0.x
  • Added check of RequiresValidationContext before calling IsValid #110647
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • vxsort: Add Arm64 Neon implementation and tests #110692
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix ReadBufferState dispose cases #110739
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Vectorize System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary #110701
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Collections

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [SwiftBindings] Retrieve metadata information #2892
  • [SwiftBindings] Unify code emition #2891
  • [SwiftBindings] Revert emitting Swift projection on error #2890
  • [SwiftBindings] Generate fully qualified names for projected types #2889
  • [SwiftBindings] Add support for failable constructors #2888
  • [SwiftBindings] Implement Swift generics #2887
  • [SwiftBindings] Implement algorithm deciding whether a struct should be projected as class or struct #2886
  • [SwiftBindings] Add IndirectResult support for non-constructor methods #2885

PullRequests

Created

  • [RuntimeAsync] Merge from upstream #2895
  • [SwiftBindings] Extra enum-specific entries in ValueWitnessTable #2893
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Delete CODEOWNERS to avoid notifications #2894
    area-async
  • [Swift bindings] Upgrade dotnet runtime version to 9.0.0 #2879
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [Swift bindings] Make projection tooling AOT compatible #2880
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Improve testing framework #2871
    area-SwiftBindings

Updated

  • [SwiftBindings] Add support for non-frozen structs #2870
    area-SwiftBindings
  • [SwiftBindings] Added accessors for TypeMetadata #2877
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Emit type debug info into a single module #2883
  • [Swift bindings] Add bindings experimental NuGet to the dotnet-experimental feed #2878
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Investigate failures in WorkloadTests when using net10.0 workload manifests #45516
    10.0.1xx
  • Unable to build Solution that contains multi-targeted projects and using ArtifactsPath with IncludeProjectNameInArtifactsPaths set to false #45513
    Discussion
  • Poorly formatted launchSettings.json and dotnet watch goes into production #45509
  • [NETE2ESDK] [Azure Linux ARM64] Installing .NET 10 alpha SDK in Mariner2 ARM64 2.0 or Azure Linux ARM64 3.0 should not depend on package netstandard-targeting-pack-2.1 #45499

Closed

  • dotnet tool CLI command fails when nuget.config includes a private package source #45235
  • Self-contained single-file program, published with --no-build option, needs .NET to be installed #45230
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.4xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44678
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.3xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44668
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/8.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44674
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44443
  • Single Portable File Configuration #45401
  • Clear Communication regarding Servicing Releases #45426
  • Installing net9.0 SDK on AWS Linux 2023 breaks net8.0 SDK and runtime #45440
  • Failed to run the .NET10 App with error "You must install or update .NET to run this application..." #45469

PullRequests

Created

  • Make assembly version logic more robust Fixes #44042 #45518
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable signing in the VMR official pipeline #45517
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Change Aspire RunSessionRequest definition #45515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Microsoft.NET.Publish.targets GetCopyToPublishDirectoryItems depends on AssignProjectConfiguration #45512
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [VMR] Disable codeql on arm64 mac builds #45511
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [dotnet-watch] Make pipe reads and writes fully async #45495
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Added 🟣 to step names #45494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [release/9.0.2xx] Expand MSBuildSdkResolver #45459
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use dotnet exec to run test app in CheckTargetFrameworkDisplayName #45332
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use variables for container values #45490
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Use a crossgen2 that runs on the host for R2Ring in a VMR build #45463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch to spliting our test work items by method instead of class. #44898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • File watcher improvements #45131
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Support package@version syntax for dotnet workload search/update/install version Fixes #42367 #45156
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Prepare GenAPI so it can be used for a new assembly diff generator #45389
    untriaged, Team:Runtime, Area-Tools
  • Enable package source mapping #45483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45427
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • [DO NOT MERGE} Skip a few tests on osx #45419
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2603592 #45465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use managed Mach-O signer on non-Mac hosts #45019
    area-Host, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #45365
    untriaged, Area-CodeFlow
  • Re-Bootstrap Source Build to .NET 10.0.100-alpha.1.24612.1 #45435
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not automatically add nuget.org as a package source when it is absent from nuget.config Fixes #44312 #45410
    untriaged, Area-Templates
  • Copy dump file to the Helix upload location #45345
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add VMR leg that builds test projects #44843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Installer/finalizer in c# #44611
    Area-Infrastructure, 10.0.1xx
  • Fix missing test binlog #45480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Read global.json to decide to run dotnet test in vstest or testing platform mode #45418
    Area-DotNet Test, config-system-candidate
  • Add integration tests for dotnet test scenarios #45138
    Area-DotNet Test

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0058 triggers on expressions with 'out' params #76477
  • Visual Studio 2022 v17.12 breaks binding to [ObservableProperty] #76470
  • Recommend preprocessing symbols that have already been typed out in the document #76469
  • Unable to load analyzer assembly when targeting ARM64 #76467

Closed

  • rename operation corrupts unrelated source code #76439
  • Extract Method on part of an expression generates invalid code #38087
    18.0
  • Revisit error handling for TaskExtensions.SafeContinueWith #47891
    Backlog
  • Remove SafeContinueWith helpers #44150
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35616.137 #76472
  • The warning about `yield return` in lock statements (CS9237) is documented in reference but not implemented. #76442
  • Remove type-forwarders added to avoid breaking TypeScript #43313
  • After entering the method, the parenthesis Automatically outputs the parentheses after entering a method #55085
  • the flag (tag? dont know the name) regarding inheritance is misleading #58992
  • Compiler error when compiling generator with `allow ref struct` type param #76456
    17.14

PullRequests

Created

  • Update telemetry to 17.13.28 #76480
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove usage of WaitAndGetResult from debugger paths #76479
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove usages of WaitAndGetResult from object browser. #76478
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Propagate marked attributes from primary constructor parameters to backing fields. #76475
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove TaskQueue and SafeContinueWith extensions #76459
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Fix parsing of for-loops #76476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Call Enter/LeaveRegion APIs for binary expressions #76412
    Area-Compilers, VSCode, Next
  • Remove usages of TaskQueue from interactive component #76455
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2602943 #76454
    auto-merge
  • Remove usage of task extension in rename tracking #76463
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Task Queue from unit teseting layer #76457
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove usage of WaitAndGetResult #76474
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move to simpler task patterns. #76448
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update PublishData.json to add new branch #76471
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of task extension in rename tracking #76462
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify model computation threading #76461
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • remove synchronous blocking waits in async codepaths #76465
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Delete task extension used only by the interactive window. #76450
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Remove Edgio CDN usage #76466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove use of WaitAndGetResult #76464
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Calculate the hash code in an unchecked block #76460
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move Default VB Version to 17.13 #76452
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to release/dev17.13 #76458
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Do not report conflicting types errors for source-generated APIs #71546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Warn for redundant pattern in `not ... or <redundant>` pattern #75581
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Dictionary expressions: initial binding and lowering support #76257
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add option for choosing stdio as the LSP communication channel #76437
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add spec for the data section string literals feature #76139
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla #59531
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #59530
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-noop, antiforgery-validation, fortunes_dapper #59529
  • Support F# option type in OpenApi schema generator #59528
    Backlog
  • FromQueryAttribute fails to deserialize complex object if object is the same name as a containing property #59527
  • Possible memory leak in IIS when StartupHook initializes #59524
  • Blazor WASM initial download timeout/retry #59522
  • Blazor net9 PathBase not working #59521
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #59520
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #59519
  • UseStaticFiles does compression on publish with .net9 #59518

Closed

  • Range Attribute to specify a value inside an array max/min lengths #58993
  • Serialization for Blazor 10 app state store/restore capability #59489
  • [Blazor] JS stopPropagation would prevent the `@onclick` event of blazor #59499
  • Benchmark stopped running: blazorWebInteractiveAuto, blazorWebInteractiveServer, blazorWebInteractiveWebAssembly #59494
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #59508

PullRequests

Created

  • Consume `M.A.App.Internal.Assets` from the SDK during source build #59526
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fixed the area-blazor ownership #59512
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update testing analyzers #59516
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Adds the ability to specify an appsettings file for user-jwts #58605
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Implement the Mvc PushFileStreamResult API #58161
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [DRAFT] perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection
  • Upgrade to Microsoft.OpenApi 2.x and support OpenAPI v3.1 #59480
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • [Reopen] Fix ANCM installer on ARM64 #59483
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59362
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Fix Kestrel host header mismatch handling when port in Url #59403
    Servicing-approved, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking, 8.0.x
  • [release/2.3] Update dependencies to the latest #59509
    area-infrastructure

Issues

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Radiobutton not visible in .Net Maui on iOS 18 #26689
  • MAUI .NET9.0 does not build, getting lots of errors VS17.12.3 #26688
  • .NET MAUI9 updates the titlebar of a form, but the title bar of a form cannot add a menu bar like ContentPage #26687
    Backlog
  • Can't opt out of edetoedge opt out. #26683
  • Bug: Make TargetType support abstract classes #26672
    .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] CollectionView ScrollTo method crashes on with invalid values #26669
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • The RealParent on Syncfusion.Maui.PdfViewer.SfPdfViewer has been Garbage Collected. #26666
  • [MAUI] I5_ EmptyView - No string is shown in the three 'EmptyView String' pages #26663
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Unable to dynamically set unselected IconImageSource Color on Android #26662
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] ListView scroll position maintains after items refresh #26661
    .NET 9 Servicing

Closed

  • tutorial(macos): Fresh XCode 16.2 errors out when trying the Run with Debug step #26686
  • Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #21916
    .NET 9 SR3
  • On Windows - MAUI Label with InputTransparent="true" does still take the click event #26678
  • iOS .Net 9 TapGestureRecognizer not working anymore on Button #26668
  • Onboard to source.dot.net #6814
    .NET 9 SR3
  • The .NET 9 Maui app unable to read .json file #26310
    .NET 9 SR3
  • Page specific ResourceDictionary crashes the app on iOS and Android, and not working on Windows #26638
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Softkeyboard Return key of an Entry control shows Done when the property ReturnType is set to Next #23086
    Backlog
  • [Android] Some phones MediaPicker.Default.CapturePhotoAsync() is causing app reset .NET 9 and crash on others #26541
  • Firebase analytics symbols not loading in IOS proj #26660
  • NSInternalInconsistencyException Reason: Invalid update: invalid number of sections #26647
    .NET 9 Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "[Windows] `FileSystem.Current.AppDataDirectory` returns different path after updating to latest version - fix" #26685
    .NET 9 SR2.2
  • [ci] Update stable iOS and Android versions #26684
    area-infrastructure
  • Fixed - [Windows] ListView Items Text Not Rendered inside the TabbedPage #26681
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Set height for EmptyView if is not an iView #26680
    area-controls-collectionview, i/regression, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 54 #26676
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 53 #26675
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 52 #26674
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [X] Avoid unnecessary steps #26671
  • Fix for BindableLayout.ItemsSource no longer works from 8.0.61 #26665
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • Fixed Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #25852
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 13330: Build ID 10722334 #26673
  • [ci] Enable source index #26557
    area-infrastructure, t/docs 📝, .NET 9 SR3
  • Revert "Add Gerald & Javier as UI Test CODEOWNERS" #26667
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 49 #26609
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • LEGO: Pull request from lego/hb_7241b85a-f216-4d55-a9fa-d8030c736df5_20241216202003328 to main #26658

Updated

  • Fixed Extra Padding on iOS buttons required when image on top or bottom #26018
    community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Implement Mac TitleBar #25670
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fix for CollectionView with RefreshView when ObservableCollection<T>.Clear() throws System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #26573
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Update SkiaSharp #26373
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Inherit UIContainerView from MauiView #26576
    area-architecture, community ✨
  • [Mac Catalyst] Set window dimensions #24001
    platform/macOS 🍏, p/1, community ✨, area-controls-window, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Testing] Enable snapshot tests on Catalyst #25710
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-testing
  • Fix more things with fonts (embedded) and unpackaged apps #26515
    area-fonts
  • Change iOS SetNeedsLayout propagation mechanism #26629
    area-layout, community ✨
  • [ci] Add unit test jobs to dnceng builds #26623
    area-testing
  • Don’t call NSAttributedString with HTML from a background thread #26153
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, area-controls-label, .NET 9 SR3
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Windows] Optimize `LayoutHandler.Windows.cs` (take 2) #26460
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Windows] Fix for wrong secondary ToolbarItem size #25550
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Fixed [Windows] TabbedPage current page indicator can be wrong #26202
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • [Windows] Fix Shell animation and button visual states on Shell nav #26521
    area-navigation
  • [iOS] CollectionView with header and "complex" item will have the wrong position after a refresh with a RefreshView #26575
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix android image loading race condition and improve logging #25870
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix for CarouselView reverts to displaying 1st item in collection when collection modified #26608
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Exception occurring when using the GroupShortNameBinding in a Grouped ListView #26613
    community ✨, area-controls-listview, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for issue 23316 Android AVIF support with Glide #25376
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, do-not-merge
  • Fix for issue 24557 Android OnKeyUp not capturing keypresses #25429
    platform/android 🤖, area-keyboard
  • [SECURITY] `Microsoft.Sbom.Targets` nuget for package SBOM #26093
    area-infrastructure
  • [PERFORMANCE][SECURITY] Refactored Regex to cached (static readonly, Compiled, source generated, with timeout for security) #26095
    area-architecture
  • [Windows] Fix for UI not updating GridItemsLayout when Span becomes 1. #26370
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Reset ListView ScrolledEventArgs.ScrollY when ItemsSource changes #25362
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-listview
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium - 51 #26656
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨, area-controls-contextmenu, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR3
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] Fix for SearchHandler Fails to Display Results. #26572
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix for Tabs does not invoke its IQueryAttributable.ApplyQueryAttributes(query) #25663
    area-navigation, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [net9.0][Enhancement][iOS] Add a done button to entry #24645
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [iOS] Using long-press navigation on back button with shell pages - fix #24003
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Shell toolbar items #20510
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fixed Using safe area causes white area at the top upon entry focus #26063
    area-layout, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Label with a fixed WidthRequest has wrong height in Grid #26648
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-label, layout-grid

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to save AuditEvent entities in the same transaction? #35345
  • PendingChanges exception when applying a specific migration #35342
    9.0.x
  • Trying to scaffold jsonb column throws "An item with the same key has already been added" #35338
  • Support shadow properties on value type complex types #35337
    Backlog

Closed

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Database.Command: Taking time to execute the queries because of new DateOnly datatype in .NET 8 #35248
  • CS8103: Combined length of user strings used by the program exceeds allowed limit. Try to decrease use of string literals. #35270
  • [Q] Map JSON column to both string and strongly-typed data #35313
  • EF Bundle should also generate rollback app #35340
  • EF8/EF9 Bug - cannot update database including migrations #35344
  • Problem with Bounded Context and Shared DbContext Base in a Modular Monolith using DDD #34646
  • LocalView goes out of sync and throws an IndexOutOfRangeException #35243
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't throw PendingModelChangesWarning when applying a specific migration #35343
  • More translation test cleanup (Random, DateTime.Parse/new, bitwise operators) #35341
  • Update dependencies and transform Span-based overloads to Enumerable in funcletizer #35339

Merged

  • Don't attempt to remove a detached entry from the local view #35253

Updated

  • Translate to NULLIF #35327
  • [WIP] Handle first class spans #35279
  • Adding Half type support for SqlLite #35328
